Package suncertify.utils

This package contains highly reusable classes that may be useful to other programs besides URLyBird.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EditManager This class provides cut, copy and paste actions that are enabled and disabled depending on the component that currently has focus.
FilenameComboBox Combo box decorator for an editable combo box that will be used to enter filenames.
IntegerDocumentFilter Simple class to restrict input to non-negative integer values.
LengthDocumentFilter Simple class to limit the input length to a given value.
Localization Simple utility class to localize strings.
PeekableTable A JTable that provides tooltips for items that are too wide to display fully.
SmartComboBox A decorator class for an editable combo box.
SortableTableModel This class provides row sorting support for tables.
 

Package suncertify.utils Description

This package contains highly reusable classes that may be useful to other programs besides URLyBird.
